lead_paragraph: The Haas Formula One team are hoping to announce their 2017 driver lineup within days after reports that Denmark's Kevin Magnussen is set to join from Renault in place of Mexican Esteban Gutierrez.

headline.print_headline: Haas Decision Leaves Gutierrez Facing Uncertain Future
headline.main: Haas Decision Leaves Gutierrez Facing Uncertain Future

snippet: The Haas Formula One team are hoping to announce their 2017 driver lineup within days after reports that Denmark's Kevin Magnussen is set to join from Renault in place of Mexican Esteban Gutierrez....
